  • public interface ServerMonitorAPI
    An API to use to manipulate Server Assistant via

    • Method Detail

      • getResponseManager

        ResponseManager getResponseManager()
        Get the ResponseManager. ResponseManager handles the registration of event responders and the invokation of responses to events.
        Returns:
        The ResponseManager

      • getDetectorManager

        DetectorManager getDetectorManager()
        Get the DetectorManager. DetectorManager handles the registration of Detectors (That detect and fire events).
        Returns:
        The DetectorManager
